729508f-a.title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Simonson Avenue
729508f-a.text:
2746 Richmond Terrace, south side, between Simonson and Van Name Avenues, showing the home of Dr. Satterthwaite. He was a surgeon in the Union Army during the Civil Var.
September 28, 1924
By Wm. T. Davis through P. L. Sperr
729508f-a.folder: Richmond Terrace & Simonson Avenue, Staten Island, NY
